title: Please HELP ME For the love of 7 years of League
body:
I try to move the window so I can see options but *boop* No sign in no options no friendlist no tank masteries.
And If I try to move it while trying to sign in it does the same and I have to close and open again.

replies.body:
Ah, so the Beta Client does this on lower resolution displays. You can reduce the DPI scaling by hitting **CTRL** and tapping the **-** key. 

I hope this helped! ^.^
Thanks a lot Targon :) Have a great day
